name: Mgr. Marek Polák, Ph.D.
short_desc_en: Marek has PhD. in Software Engineering, specifically in data modeling. He has various work experiences from corporate sector such as banking, telco and automotive as well as from start-up scene too. He is the person responsible for application architecture and design we produce.
short_desc_cz: Mgr. Marek Polák, Ph.D. je systémový architekt zaštiťující vývoj software z technické a bezpečnostní stránky. Oficiální pozice: Coffee Machine Manager.
